summary: A command‑line utility that converts a multimodal instruction dataset (JSON + images) into a packed, indexed format suitable for training NeMo multimodal language models. It loads the data, tokenizes text, encodes images with a specified vision encoder, applies a configurable sequence‑packing algorithm to fit tokens and image embeddings within a maximum length, and writes the result to an indexed dataset directory.
business_intent: Enable efficient preparation of large multimodal training corpora for large language models by automating tokenization, image processing, and optimal sequence packing, thereby reducing training time and memory usage.
